title: Earth Therapeutics Aloe Moisture Gloves Pink
description: Earth Therapeutics Aloe Moisture Gloves Blue These super-soft gloves are infused with natural Aloe Vera and Vitamin E to continually moisturize and pamper hands. To further enhance hydration, massage your favorite lotion into hands before slipping on the Moisturizing Gloves. With regular treatment, hands will feel softer and smoother. Aloe Vera and Vitamin E infusion normally lasts through approximately 20 washings. Product Features: Super-soft gloves are infused with natural aloe vera and vitamin E. Continually moisturize and pamper hands. With regular treatment hands will feel softer and smoother. Item Specifications: Color: Blue Pink Directions: Machine wash cold in gentle cycle. Do not iron. Tumble-dry low. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Ingredients: 97% Nylon, 3% Spandex.
